languages.text: "Доверие? Как ненадежно. Нет, я просто выкрал и запытал того кабалита, что был посвящен в эту тайну. Возможно, Иремерисс даже поверила в легенду, что жалкий ублюдок сбежал".

"Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."
languages.original_text: "Доверие? Как ненадежно. Нет, я просто выкрал и запытал того кабалита, что был посвящен в эту тайну. Возможно, Иремерисс даже поверила в легенду, что жалкий ублюдок сбежал".

traits.locale_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Confiance ? La confiance est une faiblesse. Non. Je me suis contenté d'enlever et de torturer le Kabalite qui était au courant de ce secret. Il est même possible qu'Yremeryss ait cru à la fuite de cette vermine pathétique. »
languages.original_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."

traits.locale_text: « Confiance ? La confiance est une faiblesse. Non. Je me suis contenté d'enlever et de torturer le Kabalite qui était au courant de ce secret. Il est même possible qu'Yremeryss ait cru à la fuite de cette vermine pathétique. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “相信？我可不会指望这么脆弱的东西。不，我绑架了知道秘密的阴谋团成员，狠狠地折磨了他，从他嘴里掏出了秘密。伊芮梅莉斯说不定真的会以为那个一事无成的废物偷偷逃走了。”
languages.original_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."

traits.locale_text: “相信？我可不会指望这么脆弱的东西。不，我绑架了知道秘密的阴谋团成员，狠狠地折磨了他，从他嘴里掏出了秘密。伊芮梅莉斯说不定真的会以为那个一事无成的废物偷偷逃走了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「信頼？あてにならんな。そうではなく、俺はこの秘密を知るカバライトを拉致して拷問しただけだ。哀れな弱虫が逃げ出したという話を、イレメリスが信じた可能性だってあるのだからな」
languages.original_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."

traits.locale_text: 「信頼？あてにならんな。そうではなく、俺はこの秘密を知るカバライトを拉致して拷問しただけだ。哀れな弱虫が逃げ出したという話を、イレメリスが信じた可能性だってあるのだからな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Vertrauen? Zu unverlässlich. Nein, ich entführte und folterte ein Mitglied der Kabale, um an das Geheimnis zu kommen. Vielleicht hat Yremeryss die Geschichte über den armseligen Schwächling, der sich aus dem Staub gemacht hat, ja tatsächlich abgekauft."
languages.original_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."

traits.locale_text: "Vertrauen? Zu unverlässlich. Nein, ich entführte und folterte ein Mitglied der Kabale, um an das Geheimnis zu kommen. Vielleicht hat Yremeryss die Geschichte über den armseligen Schwächling, der sich aus dem Staub gemacht hat, ja tatsächlich abgekauft."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Confianza? Así no se llega a nada. No, sencillamente capturé y torturé al otro kabalista que conocía el secreto. Incluso cabe la posibilidad de que Yremeryss se creyese la patraña de que se fugó porque era débil y patético».
languages.original_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."

traits.locale_text: «¿Confianza? Así no se llega a nada. No, sencillamente capturé y torturé al otro kabalista que conocía el secreto. Incluso cabe la posibilidad de que Yremeryss se creyese la patraña de que se fugó porque era débil y patético».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Güven mi? Öyle bir duyguya bel bağlanmaz. Ben bu sırrı elinde bulunduran Kabalist'i kaçırıp ona işkence ettim. Yremeryss, zavallının şeyin kaçıp gittiği masalına inanmış olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Trust? How unreliable. No, I simply abducted and tortured the Kabalite who was privy to this secret. There is even a chance that Yremeryss believed the story about the pathetic weakling running off."

traits.locale_text: "Güven mi? Öyle bir duyguya bel bağlanmaz. Hayır, bu sırrı elinde bulunduran Kabalist'i kaçırdım ve ona işkence ettim sadece. Yremeryss'in zavallı ezik şeyin kaçıp gittiğine dair hikâyeye inanmış olma ihtimali bile var."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
